page.title: 13 RECREATION ( Children )
page.content:
How children who live in Dartford spend their spare time? Boys Most boys like playing on their bikes, watching television and swimming. Given more free time they would use it to play outside more and travel further afield. Given more money they would spend it on clothes.
Girls In their spare time girls like. shopping, listening to music and decorating their rooms. Given more time they would do more sport, and spend more on clothes and travel. It seems that children in Dartford area do very similar things in their spare time no matter what their age or sex.
